thread.title: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say - Houston Chronicle
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say - Houston Chronicle - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Houston Chronicle
title: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say - Houston Chronicle
text:
In this April 24, 2007, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom sits on the bench in the fourth quarter of a Western Conference playoff basketball game against the Phoenix Suns in Phoenix. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel.
 Houston Chronicle.
